column5: Hey guys. Anyone got any reports of ice conditions for any of the smaller lakes in the area. Anything would be great. I'll post a report if i go Thanks Chrome

CC you need to post this in the main forum... it wont get many views in the Help section. The Help section is designed for people that are having issues with this website etc...ie navigation controls and picture posting help etc.  Gerritt.

Its a mistake I make alot ... because the new thread button for the help forum is RIGHT where you would expect the new thread button to be for the main forum ... I wonder if thats somethig that can be configured rick ?
